p: Overall, 151 (55.9%) of the 270 patients had a signal pathogen detected ( Table 2). Patients with a signal pathogen detected were divided into three groups according to age; children aged ≤16 years ( n = 114) were the largest group in our study. The number of people in the age groups 16–49 and ≥50 years was small compared with the youngest group, with 111 and 45 patients in each group, respectively.
